name: Insurance Verification Automation
description: Automatically verify patient insurance eligibility and coverage before appointments. Reduce claim denials, estimate patient costs, and notify patients of any coverage issues proactively.

messages.update_insurance_en:
ğŸ“ *Update Insurance Information*

Please provide your updated insurance details:

1. Insurance company name
2. Policy/Member ID number
